DarkMouse::

She smiled to herself. She was pleased with this whole set up. She 
knew that here in this ship, there were maps to all the bases, info 
on most of the groups, and perhaps, they might even know the fianly 
resting place of Megatron. She still had a score to settle with him.
She looked up at Galvatron and nodded, her face was blank. "Yes, 
thanks. I'll take you up on that offer." She studied the locations of 
the bases. Then yawned,"Yeah, I need a nap. Gee, for sleeping for so 
long I feel awefully tired. Mind if I go rest and recharge for a bit 
there Boss Bot?"  She was always giving her superiors nick names, and 
this one was no exception. "Where are those quarters again?" She 
said, yawning again.





--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron looked at her. He didnt say anythign but i think she 
took what he 
> said the wrong way. he was very impressed by her. he hoped she 
would stay. 
> "Yes that would be it. They may still be there. If your planning to 
stay 
> those quarters can be your for as long as you want." He typed in 
some numbers 
> and the feactions names came up over all the bases. His was not on 
there for 
> while cloaked it wasnt detectable on any scanner. he pointed on the 
map. 
> "This is where we are. CLose to the decepticon base here." he 
pointed slighty 
> to the right. "they may be a problem."
